🔍 Search FAQ

Placing an order on PolymerShop Modern is simple and secure:

  1. Browse our product catalog and click "Add to Cart" on items you want
  2. Review your cart and click "Checkout" when ready
  3. Enter your shipping and billing information
  4. Choose your payment method (credit card, PayPal, etc.)
  5. Review your order and click "Place Order"

You'll receive a confirmation email with your order details and tracking information.

We accept a variety of secure payment methods:

  • 💳 Credit/Debit Cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express)
  • 🅿️ PayPal
  • 💰 Bank Transfer
  • 📱 Apple Pay & Google Pay
  • 🪙 Cryptocurrency (Bitcoin, Ethereum)

All transactions are encrypted and secure. We never store your payment information on our servers.

Our shipping times vary by location and shipping method:

  • 🚚 Standard Shipping: 5-7 business days
  • ✈️ Express Shipping: 2-3 business days
  • 🚀 Overnight Shipping: 1 business day

Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days. You'll receive tracking information via email once your order ships.

Yes! We offer free shipping on orders over €50 within the European Union. For international orders:

  • 🆓 Free shipping on orders over €100
  • 📦 Standard international shipping: €15
  • ✈️ Express international shipping: €35

All shipping costs are clearly displayed during checkout before you place your order.

We offer a 30-day return policy on most items:

  • 📅 30 days to return items from delivery date
  • 📦 Items must be in original condition and packaging
  • 🏷️ Price tags and labels must be intact
  • 🚫 No returns on personalized or custom items

Return shipping costs are covered by us for defective items. For other returns, customers pay return shipping unless the item was damaged during transit.

Starting a return is easy:

  1. Log into your account or contact customer service
  2. Provide your order number and reason for return
  3. Receive a return authorization and shipping label
  4. Package the item securely in its original packaging
  5. Drop off at your nearest shipping location

Once we receive your return, refunds are processed within 3-5 business days and appear in your account within 1-2 billing cycles.

Creating an account is quick and free:

  1. Click "Sign Up" in the top navigation
  2. Enter your email address and create a password
  3. Verify your email address
  4. Complete your profile with shipping information

Having an account allows you to track orders, save favorite items, and enjoy a faster checkout experience.
